A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is garbage! I am a huge Star Wars fan. I watched everyone since they came out. I felt totally let down by this movie. Even the prequels with Jar Jar are better than this movie. What happened to the magic? Episode 7 was good\, This episode had no character development and was all over the place. I will not be buying this movie. I feel depressed and feeling ripped off.
